snippet: For 32 years, Peridance Capezio Center in Manhattan has welcomed all pursuing a love of movement, from Broadway professionals to absolute beginners.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Peridance Capezio Center, dance studio near Union Square that has become hub for many in city's dance community.
lead_paragraph: For 32 years, Peridance Capezio Center in Manhattan has welcomed all pursuing a love of movement, from Broadway professionals to absolute beginners.

headline.print_headline: There’s Room for Everyone at the Barre
headline.main: A School With Room for Everyone at the Barre
